experience.organization: Paul G. Allen School of Computer Science & Engineering
experience.description: Collaborated on a faculty-led research project focused on optimizing distributed systems. Developed automated performance testing scripts in Java and implemented a custom data serialization protocol in C++ to reduce network overhead by 15%.

experience.organization: UW Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering
experience.description: Conducted a study on memory-efficient algorithms for real-time signal processing. Built a comparative simulation framework using C++ to evaluate the trade-offs between static and dynamic memory allocation in embedded environments.
